message: Data shows that diversity significantly contributes to greater profitability for companies! Despite metrics affirmatively indicating that diversity increases overall company success, many law firms and other organizations that want to promote diversity find themselves battling common implicit biases that inhibit the recruitment and retention of diverse talent.

Join Ama Yawson, attorney & President/Founder of Milestales Publishing, for Build Your All-Star Team With Inclusive Interviewing, a members-only presentation on Thursday, November 9 at 1:00 p.m. ET/10:00 a.m. PT.
message3: Please note: This presentation is accredited for one hour of Implicit Bias MCLE credit in California and one hour of general MCLE credit in South Carolina for all levels. It has been approved for Minimum Continuing Legal Education credit by the State Bar of Texas Committee on MCLE in the amount of one credit hour, of which one hour will apply to legal ethics credit.
If you want to earn CLE credit for your attendance at this webinar, you will need to upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to take advantage of this exclusive benefit.

message: Do you want to increase diversity in your law firm? Do you want to overcome implicit bias in your recruitment and retention of talent? Do you simply want to learn more about promoting diversity and inclusion in your law firm’s practices? If you said yes to any of these questions, we have a webinar for you!
Join Ama Yawson, attorney & President/Founder of Milestales Publishing, for Build Your All-Star Team With Inclusive Interviewing, a members-only presentation today at 1:00 p.m. ET/10:00 a.m. PT.

message: Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation! You must complete your attendance verification to receive CLE credit. As a reminder, if you have a free Justia Connect membership, you must upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to receive CLE credit.
The steps below must be completed by 11:00 a.m. PT on Saturday, November 11, 2023 to receive credit.
number-list: Input the attendance verification code received during your presentation.
Follow the remaining prompts in the form to input all pertinent information and offer evaluation of the MCLE presentation.
Download your certificate, and you’re done!
message2: If you have any questions about verification, please contact Justia Support.

message: Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation, Build Your All Star Team With Inclusive Interviewing. We love connecting our members with new learning opportunities and hope you found the webinar both engaging and informative.
As we continue to plan future Justia Webinars for Justia Connect members, we want to hear from you! If you have not already done so, please share your feedback about your recent webinar experience.
